mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review(review_no, review_des, review_date, review_id, review_title) VALUES (review_seq.nextVal,#{reviewDes},SYSDATE,#{reviewId},#{reviewTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Review ORDER BY review_no DESC)a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
